name: YuraYura! - Tidying up the tilting tower!
name_original: YuraYura! - Tidying up the tilting tower!
description:
YuraYura! - Tidying up the tilting tower is a physics game about a maid named Yurika, who takes up a part time job cleaning and defending the infamous tilting towers. This dangerous, but high-paying gig lasts for 6 stages, plus one secret stage! Blast the dangerous Dust Bunnies and clear Junk like your life depends on it...because it does!

Do you have what it takes to help her out?

Check our socials out here!

Graphics/ Programming -  @mrbluemydude

Music/ Sound Design - @CFY98

"Thanks for the help!"

The Standalone version is the definitive version due to some physics inconsistencies/ performance issues, but the Web Version is perfectly playable at the moment!

There is also a MacOS build available now as of 10/6/2021.
